ffData
===================

<br>
<br>

<br><br>
Overview BLABLA
--------
ffData is an R-package for downloading financial data. It allows you to automatically download portfolio returns from the [Kenneth R. French Data Library](https://mba.tuck.dartmouth.edu/pages/faculty/ken.french/data_library.html).

<br><br><br>
Using it
--------

- Install the R package:
```
library(devtools)
install_github("antshi/ffData")
library(epuRate)
```
- Open a new rmd file in Rstudio: File -> New File -> R Markdown -> From Template -> epuRate.

- Change  the Header of your document with your name, email adress, github / twitter / linkedIn details if you want to display them. You can also add a logo over the table of content.
